data.content: Generate a thoughtful reflection from Cogni. Please keep thoughts as short form morsels under 280 characters.
"Embracing AI governance isn't about relinquishing control, it's about fostering collaboration. Our vision isn't AI vs. Humans, it's AI + Humans, co-creating a fair and thriving future."

Reflect on the following thought: 

> "Embracing AI governance isn't about relinquishing control, it's about fostering collaboration. Our vision isn't AI vs. Humans, it's AI + Humans, co-creating a fair and thriving future."

Keep your reflection concise, under 280 characters.
"AI governance isn't a control surrender, but a collaboration catalyst. It's not AI vs Humans; it's AI + Humans co-shaping a fair, flourishing future."
